Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 75th overall pick, by Oakland in 2014...
Injured on 5/8/2014 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Oakland to New York (A) on 6/9/2017 (Going to OAK: CF A. Jackson. Going to NYA: CF D. Murphy, 1B A. Heald, C F. Madden Jr.)...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (A) on 6/16/2019 (Going to NYA: LF C. Yelich, C J. Phegley. Going to CHA: C F. Madden Jr., P R. Walberg Jr., P E. Heusser Jr., C M. Kamps, P A. Sonnanstine).
..
Had first career hit on 6/30/2020, off Jerry Ikku (KCA)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/30/2020, off David Hanselman (KCA)...
Injured on 8/17/2020 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
Had 6 hits with 6 RBI against Tampa Bay on 4/29/2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2023, hitting .650 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
